name: Return Order Management (RMA)
description: Return Order Management (RMA), a complete solution for Wholesale Companies. With the RMA app it is possibile to register a RMA ID and manage goods returns. There can be a lot of reasons why goods where delivered wrong and each reason can result in different actions. The RMA call is the central point from which the process is managed, controlled and followed. Several NAV documents (return orders, service orders) can be coupled and created. Problem codes with checklists can be used. Also actions can be assigned.For now only available for UK and Netherlands.
